dt: {bc}any of various common omnivorous black-and-white New World mammals (especially genus {it}Mephitis{/it}) of the weasel family that have a pair of perineal glands from which a secretion of pungent and offensive odor is ejected

et: earlier {it}squuncke{/it}, from a Massachusett reflex of Algonquian {it}*šeka·kwa{/it}, from {it}šek-{/it} urinate + {it}-a·kw{/it} fox, fox-like animal
shortdef: any of various common omnivorous black-and-white New World mammals (especially genus Mephitis) of the weasel family that have a pair of perineal glands from which a secretion of pungent and offensive odor is ejected

dt: {bc}to prevent entirely from scoring or succeeding {bc}{sx|shut out||}

shortdef: to prevent entirely from scoring or succeeding : shut out
to fail to pay; also : cheat

dt: {bc}a common North American skunk ({it}Mephitis mephitis{/it}) usually with white on the top of the head that extends posteriorly in two narrowly separated stripes

shortdef: a common North American skunk (Mephitis mephitis) usually with white on the top of the head that extends posteriorly in two narrowly separated stripes
